source.name: Maruti Suzuki Driving School
source.attribution: Road signs and descriptions sourced from Maruti Suzuki Driving School's educational materials. Used for educational purposes only.

mandatory.name: Mandatory Signs
mandatory.description: These road signals and signs are used to make road users aware of specific laws and regulations that must be followed.

signs.name: Stop
signs.description: This sign indicates that the vehicle must come to a complete halt.

signs.name: Give Way
signs.description: This sign indicates that the driver must give way to traffic on the main road.

signs.name: No Entry
signs.description: This sign indicates that entry is prohibited for all vehicles.

signs.name: One Way
signs.description: This sign indicates that traffic is allowed to move only in one direction.

signs.name: No Left Turn
signs.description: This sign indicates that left turn is prohibited.

signs.name: No Right Turn
signs.description: This sign indicates that right turn is prohibited.

signs.name: No U-Turn
signs.description: This sign indicates that U-turn is prohibited.

signs.name: No Overtaking
signs.description: This sign indicates that overtaking is prohibited.

signs.name: Speed Limit
signs.description: This sign indicates the maximum speed limit allowed on that road.

signs.name: No Horn
signs.description: This sign indicates that honking is prohibited in that area.

signs.name: No Parking
signs.description: This sign indicates that parking is not allowed.

signs.name: No Stopping
signs.description: This sign indicates that stopping is not allowed.

signs.name: Compulsory Turn Left
signs.description: This sign indicates that vehicles must turn left.

signs.name: Compulsory Turn Right
signs.description: This sign indicates that vehicles must turn right.

signs.name: Compulsory Go Straight
signs.description: This sign indicates that vehicles must go straight ahead.

signs.name: Compulsory Turn Left Ahead
signs.description: This sign indicates that vehicles must turn left ahead.

signs.name: Compulsory Turn Right Ahead
signs.description: This sign indicates that vehicles must turn right ahead.

signs.name: Compulsory Sound Horn
signs.description: This sign indicates that drivers must sound their horn.

signs.name: Compulsory Keep Left
signs.description: This sign indicates that vehicles must keep to the left.

signs.name: Compulsory Keep Right
signs.description: This sign indicates that vehicles must keep to the right.

signs.name: Compulsory Cycle Track
signs.description: This sign indicates that only cycles are allowed.

signs.name: Compulsory Sound Horn Prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that honking is prohibited.

signs.name: Vehicles Prohibited in Both Directions
signs.description: This sign indicates that vehicles are not allowed in both directions.

signs.name: All Motor Vehicles Prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that all motor vehicles are prohibited.

signs.name: Goods Vehicles Prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that goods vehicles are not allowed.

signs.name: Hand Cart Prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that hand carts are not allowed.

signs.name: Tonga Prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that tongas (horse-drawn carriages) are not allowed.

signs.name: Bullock Cart Prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that bullock carts are not allowed.

signs.name: Pedestrians Prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that pedestrians are not allowed.

signs.name: Cycles Prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that cycles are not allowed.

signs.name: Right/Left Turn Prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that both right and left turns are prohibited.

signs.name: Overtaking Prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that overtaking is not allowed.

cautionary.name: Cautionary Signs
cautionary.description: These signs are used to warn road users of potential hazards or dangerous conditions ahead.

signs.name: Right Hand Curve
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a right-hand curve ahead on the road.

signs.name: Left Hand Curve
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a left-hand curve ahead on the road.

signs.name: Right Hair Pin Bend
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a sharp right turn ahead.

signs.name: Left Hair Pin Bend
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a sharp left turn ahead.

signs.name: Right Reverse Bend
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a reverse right bend ahead.

signs.name: Left Reverse Bend
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a reverse left bend ahead.

signs.name: Steep Ascent
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a steep uphill section ahead.

signs.name: Steep Descent
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a steep downhill section ahead.

signs.name: Narrow Road Ahead
signs.description: This sign indicates that the road ahead becomes narrow.

signs.name: Road Wideness Ahead
signs.description: This sign indicates that the road ahead becomes wider.

signs.name: Narrow Bridge
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a narrow bridge ahead.

signs.name: Slippery Road
signs.description: This sign indicates that the road surface is slippery.

signs.name: Loose Gravel
signs.description: This sign indicates that loose earth or gravel keeps falling on the road.

signs.name: Cycle Crossing
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a cycle crossing ahead.

signs.name: Pedestrian Crossing
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a pedestrian crossing ahead.

signs.name: School Ahead
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a school ahead, so drivers should be cautious.

signs.name: Men at Work
signs.description: This sign indicates that there are workers on the road ahead.

signs.name: Cattle
signs.description: This sign indicates that cattle may be present on the road.

signs.name: Falling Rocks
signs.description: This sign indicates that the road ahead is prone to falling rocks, especially in hilly areas.

signs.name: Ferry
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a ferry service ahead to cross the river.

signs.name: Cross Road
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a crossing of roads ahead.

signs.name: Gap in Median
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a gap in the divider of the road.

signs.name: Side Road Right
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a right side turn on the road in addition to straight movement.

signs.name: Side Road Left
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a left side turn on the road.

signs.name: Y-Intersections
signs.description: This sign depicts the actual formation of road ahead.

signs.name: T-Intersection
signs.description: This sign indicates that straight ahead the traffic has to either turn left or right.

signs.name: Staggered Intersection
signs.description: These signs indicate that there are left and right turns available on the straight road.

signs.name: Major Road Ahead
signs.description: This sign is erected on arterial roads before it crosses a major road.

signs.name: Roundabout
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a roundabout ahead which is a substitute for intersection.

signs.name: Dangerous Dip
signs.description: This sign cautions the drivers that there is a dip ahead on the road.

signs.name: Hump or Rough Road
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a hump on the road ahead.

signs.name: Barrier Ahead
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a toll collection point etc. ahead.

signs.name: Speedbreaker
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a speedbreaker on the road ahead.

signs.name: Railway Crossing
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a railway crossing ahead.

signs.name: Railway Crossing (Unmanned)
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is an unmanned railway crossing ahead.

signs.name: Railway Crossing (Manned)
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a manned railway crossing ahead.

informatory.name: Informatory Signs
informatory.description: Informatory road signs are used to provide important information on direction, destination, roadside facilities, etc. to the road user. Following informative road signs helps a driver in saving time, reaching destination without wandering around. These signs are generally facilitators to the driver.

signs.name: Public Telephone
signs.description: This sign indicates the availability of Telephone near road.

signs.name: Petrol Pump
signs.description: This informatory sign indicates that there is a Petrol Pump ahead.

signs.name: Hospital
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is Hospital nearby.

signs.name: Eating Place
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is an eating-place in the vicinity.

signs.name: First Aid Post
signs.description: This sign shows that there is a First Aid facility nearby which is very useful in case of emergency or accidents.

signs.name: Light Refreshment
signs.description: This sign indicates there is facility of Light refreshment nearby on the road.

signs.name: Resting Place
signs.description: This sign is erected near motel, lodge or any other facility for resting on the road.

signs.name: No Thorough Road
signs.description: This sign is erected at the entry of such roads from which no exit is available.

signs.name: No Thorough Side Road
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is no through side road available on the main road.

signs.name: Park this Side
signs.description: This sign is erected at destination telling exactly where to park your vehicles.

signs.name: Parking Both sides
signs.description: This sign is erected at destination telling exactly where to park your vehicles. This sign indicates that vehicles can be parked on both sides.

signs.name: Parking Scooters & Motorcycles
signs.description: This sign is erected at destination, which is meant for parking of scooters and motorcycles.

signs.name: Parking Lot Cycles
signs.description: This particular sign indicates that this parking is meant for cycles.

signs.name: Taxi Stand
signs.description: This sign is erected at destination which is meant for parking taxis only.

signs.name: Auto Rickshaw Stand
signs.description: This sign is erected at destination, which is meant for parking Auto rickshaws.

signs.name: Cycle Rickshaw Stand
signs.description: This sign is erected at destination, which is meant for parking Cycle rickshaws.

signs.name: Flood Gauge
signs.description: This sign is erected on highways/roads near river, canal, lake etc. This sign indicates the level of water. It also cautions the danger level of the water.

signs.name: Destination Sign
signs.description: This sign indicates the direction and distance to various destinations falling on that particular road. These signs are generally installed before intersections.

signs.name: Direction Sign
signs.description: This sign shows the direction and distance of the destination/place written on it.
